title: How to Serve Strawberries and Cream

steps.headline: Halve the strawberries.
steps.description: After a gentle rinse and removal of the top, cut each strawberry in half.

steps.headline: Sprinkle with fine sugar.
steps.description: Cover each half with a little fine sugar.

steps.headline: Cover in cream.
steps.description: The choice of cream is up to you; it can be thick but liquid or whipped so that it peaks.

steps.headline: Leave to stand.
steps.description: This is the artful part. Set the strawberries aside to sit for one hour at room temperature. Stir it occasionally. If preferred, the strawberries can be left in the refrigerator for up to four hours. During this time, the strawberry juice, sugar and cream are combining in a way similar to marinating. The resulting flavour is more intense and enjoyable.

steps.headline: Wash the strawberries and cut the green top off.
Mix water and 1/2 of the sugar.
Mix the half & half until bubbly.
Add 1 tablespoon of sugar and vanilla extract.
Put the strawberries into a bowl of sugar water.
Layer strawberries with cream in individual cups.

text: Steps Halve the strawberries. After a gentle rinse and removal of the top, cut each strawberry in half. Sprinkle with fine sugar. Cover each half with a little fine sugar. Cover in cream. The choice of cream is up to you; it can be thick but liquid or whipped so that it peaks. Leave to stand. This is the artful part. Set the strawberries aside to sit for one hour at room temperature. Stir it occasionally. If preferred, the strawberries can be left in the refrigerator for up to four hours. During this time, the strawberry juice, sugar and cream are combining in a way similar to marinating. The resulting flavour is more intense and enjoyable. Serve. Your guests will be delighted. Alternate Method Wash the strawberries and cut the green top off.  Cut each strawberry into quarters.  Mix water and 1/2 of the sugar.  Mix the half & half until bubbly.  Add 1 tablespoon of sugar and vanilla extract.  Put the strawberries into a bowl of sugar water. Soak for 5 minutes. Layer strawberries with cream in individual cups.
